name: Basket Bros
summary:
Basket Bros is a fast-paced basketball game with online and offline gameplay. Choose a basketballer, customize your style, and compete in singleplayer and miltiplayer action.

Soar through the air and dunk all over the place in this frenzied browser-based basketball game! Grab the opening tip, take it the length of the court and shoot the 3 or throw it down and turn your bros into scrubs!

BasketBros.io is a side scrolling game where you hoop vs great opponents. Pick the high flying Zane Willow and soar for dunks, or choose Steph Flurry and his deadly 3 point arsenal!
